flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
The converter uses 4 555 Timers to store the inputs and uses a 74LS248 chip that converts BCD input into 7-Segment ready outputs.

Bill of Materials:

  • 74LS248 - Quantity: 1
  • 555 Timer - Quantity: 4
  • Push Buttons - Quantity: 5

*
